transition-show.desc_cn: Quasar的嵌入式过滤动画之一

transition-hide.desc_cn: Quasar的嵌入式过滤动画之一

size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name, or standard size name (xs|sm|md|lg|xl), for the inner Spinner (unless using the default slot)
size.desc_cn: 以CSS单位表示的大小，包括单位名称，或内部微调器的标准大小名称（xs | sm | md | lg | xl）（除非使用默认插槽）

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette for the inner Spinner (unless using the default slot)
color.desc_cn: 来自内部旋转器的Quasar调色板的组件的颜色名称（除非使用默认插槽）

label.desc: Add a label; Gets overriden when using the default slot

label-class.desc: Add CSS class(es) to the label; Works along the 'label' prop only

label-style.desc: Apply custom style to the label; Works along the 'label' prop only

dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

default.desc: Default slot is used for replacing default Spinner; Suggestions: a spinner or text
default.desc_cn: 默认插槽用于替换默认旋转器；建议：旋转器或文本
